item.title: Running ASP.Net web application with Falco on AWS Lambda
item.description: Intro This article has been written by Gabor Gergely (kodfodrasz) as a guest post on this blog. He is the lead engineer of our engineering organization working on F#, AWS and Elm. We have been using AWS Lambda with F# for a while and have some experience with it. Until now, we opted to use the plain AWS Lambda .Net Runtime provided by Amazon because we value simplicity and code being transparent so we can reason about its operation.
